===Etymology===
{{ja-kanjitab|yomi=k|まゆ}}
{{IPAchar|/majo/}} → {{IPAchar|/maju/}}

From {{etyl|ojp|ja|sort=まゆ}}.  Appears in the ''{{w|Man'yōshū}}'' poetry anthology of the mid-700s with the reading ''mayo''.  The ''ma'' element is very likely {{m|ja|目|tr=ma||eye|pos=ancient combining form of modern ''me'' reading}}, but the derivation of the ''yo'' element is unclear.
